text: The Constitution of Azerbaijan was started on 12 November 1995 by a popular referendum. It was changed three times by a popular referendums, on 24 August 2002, on 18 March 2009 and on 26 September 2016. The constitution is the "highest legal force" in Azerbaijan.Azerbaijan Constitution ==Preamble== The Preamble to the Constitution says, in order to "provide prosperity and welfare of the whole society and each individual", that the following objectives be declared: *protection of national sovereignty and territorial integrity *a constitutional democracy *make a civil society *a secular state based upon the rule of law *a "worthy life level" for citizens and "just" economic and social order *observance of "universal human values", peace and international cooperation ==Related pages== *Constitution *Constitutionalism *Constitutional economics ==References== ==Other websites== * The Constitution of Azerbaijan at the Presidential website Azerbaijan Category:Law of Azerbaijan
title: Constitution of Azerbaijan
